item.title: 升级 postgresql docker image 镜像的版本
item.description: 问题 直接在 docker-compose.yml 中修改版本后，docker-compose up 运行不起来，会报错。 FATAL: database files are incompatible with server DETAIL: The data directory was initialized by PostgreSQL version 13, which is not compatible with this version 14.3. 解决方法 删掉 v

item.title: git 回退单个文件到以前版本
item.description: git checkout 需要恢复的 commit_id 文件相对路径/文件名 按道理 git reset 也可以。 既然写到这了，就总结一下日常 git 的用法吧.�

item.title: Scope 用法
item.description: Proc.new 约等于 lambda 控制权順序不同：lambda 會將控制权丟回呼叫 method 本身，继续往下执行，而 Proc 的 return 则不会，是立即跳出。 检查参数： lambda 会对参数进行检查，如果

item.title: Ruby on Rails enums 的使用
item.description: 应用场景 有些表的字段内容不会经常变更，而且只有几项内容，没有必要新建一个表，用枚举 enum 就挺好。 Enum 就是 Rails 用来消灭魔鬼数字的工具。 如何使用 数据库字

item.title: Vscode Terminal 终端字体显示错误
item.description: vscode 终端字体不能显示图标，老是显示一个方块，原因是字体没设置正确。 Ctrl + ，打开 vscode 的设置界面，输入terminal font,找到设置项输入：Mes

item.title: 感冒随笔
item.description: 从逻辑上分析，不应该来医院。但为了不传染给家人，特别是我父亲，年龄偏大，所以还是来医院自我隔离，哪怕是感冒。 我发现我对病痛的容忍度不高。嗓子

item.title: hello 2022
item.description: Hello 2022 2022, 努力，奋斗。 做人如果没有梦想，那和咸鱼有什么区别？

item.title: Jane-Theme Footnote Preview
item.description: Hugo-theme-jane optimized for footnote. When you mouse hover the footnote1 , footnote content will be displayed.

item.title: English Creating a New Theme
item.description:
Introduction

This tutorial will show you how to create a simple theme in Hugo. I assume that you are familiar with HTML, the bash command line, and that you are comfortable using Markdown to format content. I’ll explain how Hugo uses templates and how you can organize your templates to create a theme. I won’t cover using CSS to style your theme.

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This sample post is mainly for blogdown users. If you do not use blogdown, you can skip the first section. 1. Markdown or R Markdown This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc.

item.title: Creating a New Theme
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will show you how to create a simple theme in Hugo. I assume that you are familiar with HTML, the bash command line, and that you are comfortable using Markdown to format content. I’ll explain how Hugo uses templates and how you can organize your templates to create a theme. I won’t cover using CSS to style your theme. We’ll start with creating a new site with a very basic template.
